name: The Arsonist
description:
The Weekly game jam entry for week 89. The theme is "arson". I twisted the theme a little based on the graphics I could come up with from opengameart.com. Also I used a bunch of sounds from freesound.org. Not the least thanks to Joshua McLean for the music. 

The game is about a lone Arsonist. A magic user in the art of fire. He like to throw fireballs. There is some kind of AI in the game. Ad hoc made. Check the game out!

Yeah one more thing remember to jump :)

Controls

WASD - Move
Space - Jump
Left mouse button - Fireball
